snakeai.game.agent_controller module¶

AgentGame¶

class snakeai.game.agent_controller.AgentGame(dim=20, fps=7, show=True, replayAllowed=False, mode='window')¶

Bases: snakeai.game.user_controller.UserGame

The class for controlling the game when played by an agent

Parameters

  • dim (int, default=20) – the side of the board

  • fps (int, default=7) – the number of fps

  • show (Bool, deafult=True) – Whether to show the GUI or not

  • replayAllowed (Bool, default=False) – whether the game should wait for replay after game over

  • mode (str {window, cli}, default=”window”) – The type of interface

Variables

  • model (Snake) – The model for the game

  • view (GeneralView) – The GUI for the game

  • frameTime (float) – The duration of each frame in seconds (if show is set to True)

  • replayAllowed (Bool) – Whether the game should close immediately at game over

  • toInit (bool) – Whether the GUI should be initialized

play(agent=None)¶

Play a complete game

Parameters

agent (AbstractAgent, optional) – The agent that will play the game. If not initialized, the program rais ean error

Raises

AttributeError – If the agent is not set

quit()¶

Quit the game

reset()¶
start()¶

Start the game

Returns

The state at the beginning of the game

Return type

FrozenState

step(action)¶

Execute one step (frame) of the game

Parameters

action (Actions) – the direction in which to move

Returns

  • FrozenState – The state before the step

  • int – The reward obtained

  • FrozenState – The state after the step

  • Bool – True if the new state is terminal, False otherwise

waitForQuit()¶

Wait until the game can be quitted
